mapper.select:
SELECT THCLADV.ID, THCLADV.REMARK, THCLADV.PATCHREASON, THCLADV.WORKUNITPHONENUMBER, THCLADV.SPOUSEWORKUNITPHONENUMBER, THCLADV.HASHOUSE, THCLADV.STATUS, THCLADV.HASMORTGAGE, THCLADV.CUSTOMERSERVICEMANAGER, THCLADV.APPLYDATE, THCLADV.SPOUSENAME, THCLADV.FIRSTTRIALDATE, THCLADV.DISTRICTNAME, THCLADV.MONTH, THCLADV.PATCHDATE, THCLADV.IDCARDTYPE, THCLADV.HOUSEPHONENUMBER, THCLADV.IDCARDNUMBER, THCLADV.SEX, THCLADV.LOANAMOUNT, THCLADV.USES, THCLADV.REFUSEOTHERREASON, THCLADV.LINKMANPHONENUMBER3, THCLADV.LINKMANPHONENUMBER4, THCLADV.LINKMANPHONENUMBER1, THCLADV.LINKMANPHONENUMBER2, THCLADV.CUSTOMERSERVICEOFFICER, THCLADV.CREDITPRODUCTNAME, THCLADV.FINALTRIALOPERATOR, THCLADV.CLIENTNAME, THCLADV.KINPHONENUMBER1, THCLADV.KINPHONENUMBER2, THCLADV.CREATEDATE, THCLADV.TOTALPERIOD, THCLADV.KINPHONENUMBER3, THCLADV.KINPHONENUMBER4, THCLADV.TELEPHONENUMBER, THCLADV.FIRSTTRIALOPERATOR, THCLADV.URGENT, THCLADV.SPOUSETELEPHONENUMBER, THCLADV.MAXMONTHLYREPAYAMOUNT, THCLADV.WORKUNITINDUSTRY, THCLADV.CREATEOPERATORNAME, THCLADV.WORKUNITINFO, THCLADV.INTERESTRATE, THCLADV.FINALTRIALDATE, THCLADV.WORKINFO, THCLADV.LOANBILLNUMBER, THCLADV.REFUSEREASON, THCLADV.CUSTOMERSERVICETEAMMANAGER, THCLADV.STARTLIVEDATE, THCLADV.LINKINFO, THCLADV.SERVICECLIENTNAME FROM HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT_DETAIL THCLADV WHERE
AND THCLADV.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT_DETAIL ( ID, REMARK, PATCHREASON, WORKUNITPHONENUMBER, SPOUSEWORKUNITPHONENUMBER, HASHOUSE, STATUS, HASMORTGAGE, CUSTOMERSERVICEMANAGER, APPLYDATE, SPOUSENAME, FIRSTTRIALDATE, DISTRICTNAME, MONTH, PATCHDATE, IDCARDTYPE, HOUSEPHONENUMBER, IDCARDNUMBER, SEX, LOANAMOUNT, USES, REFUSEOTHERREASON, LINKMANPHONENUMBER3, LINKMANPHONENUMBER4, LINKMANPHONENUMBER1, LINKMANPHONENUMBER2, CUSTOMERSERVICEOFFICER, CREDITPRODUCTNAME, FINALTRIALOPERATOR, CLIENTNAME, KINPHONENUMBER1, KINPHONENUMBER2, CREATEDATE, TOTALPERIOD, KINPHONENUMBER3, KINPHONENUMBER4, TELEPHONENUMBER, FIRSTTRIALOPERATOR, URGENT, SPOUSETELEPHONENUMBER, MAXMONTHLYREPAYAMOUNT, WORKUNITINDUSTRY, CREATEOPERATORNAME, WORKUNITINFO, INTERESTRATE, FINALTRIALDATE, WORKINFO, LOANBILLNUMBER, REFUSEREASON, CUSTOMERSERVICETEAMMANAGER, STARTLIVEDATE, LINKINFO, SERVICECLIENTNAME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{remark}, #{patchReason}, #{workUnitPhoneNumber}, #{spouseWorkUnitPhoneNumber}, #{hasHouse}, #{status}, #{hasMortgage}, #{customerServiceManager}, #{applyDate}, #{spouseName}, #{firstTrialDate}, #{districtName}, #{month}, #{patchDate}, #{idCardType}, #{housePhoneNumber}, #{idCardNumber}, #{sex}, #{loanAmount}, #{uses}, #{refuseOtherReason}, #{linkManPhoneNumber3}, #{linkManPhoneNumber4}, #{linkManPhoneNumber1}, #{linkManPhoneNumber2}, #{customerServiceOfficer}, #{creditProductName}, #{finalTrialOperator}, #{clientName}, #{kinPhoneNumber1}, #{kinPhoneNumber2}, #{createDate}, #{totalPeriod}, #{kinPhoneNumber3}, #{kinPhoneNumber4}, #{telePhoneNumber}, #{firstTrialOperator}, #{urgent}, #{spouseTelePhoneNumber}, #{maxMonthlyRepayAmount}, #{workUnitIndustry}, #{createOperatorName}, #{workUnitInfo}, #{interestRate}, #{finalTrialDate}, #{workInfo}, #{loanBillNumber}, #{refuseReason}, #{customerServiceTeamManager}, #{startLiveDate}, #{linkInfo}, #{serviceClientName} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM HC_LA_LOANACCOUNT_DETAIL WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
